structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
The Land Court And Registration Of Title To Land

law.catch_line: Prescription, Adverse Possession Or Right Of Way By Necessity
law.text: No title to registered land, or easement or other right therein, in derogation of the title of the registered owner, shall be acquired by prescription or adverse possession. Nor shall a right of way by necessity be implied under a conveyance of registered land.
